title: Kotowari: Kimi no Kokoro no Koboreta Kakera
synopsis: Mishiro Tamanashi can see the spiritual being called Sanshishi. Ever since he met this entity, his life has changed.
characters: ['Tsuburaya, Minamo', 'Yuigahama, Yuki', 'Shirotae, Ayame', 'Tsuina, Mishiro', 'Kuchinashi, Hatsuka', 'Tachibana, Kiyomi']
